column1: #Text=This was the first election after white courts shut down the Voting Rights Act.
#Text=There were right wingers online BRAGGING about suppressing the black vote.This is a win for racism, misogyny, bigotry and xenophobia.
#Text=But, you make your bed and you lie in it.
#Text=They will get exactly what they deserve (not just those who voted for him, but those who refused to vote, or voted third party).
